account.title: Account settings
account.noPasswordSet: No password set. Add a password to sign in with your email.

account.posPasscodeDesc: Your personal POS passcode is used to log in and clock in on the Lunor point of sale. Please don't share this passcode with anyone.
account.passkeysDesc: Sign in quickly and securely with passkeys. No passwords are required. Just use your fingerprint, face or PIN. Passkeys are safe from phishing and password breaches, and your biometrics stay private. Sync up to five passkeys across devices.
account.twoStepDesc: An extra layer to boost your account security. A verification code will be required in addition to your password each time you sign in.
account.signOutEverywhereDesc: If you lost a device or left logged in to a public computer, you can sign out everywhere except your current browser.
account.securityDesc: Berhot can contact you if there's unusual activity in your account, help you access and recover your account and send you other transactional messages about your account.

notif.emailDesc: Receive email reports and alerts about your cafe operations, even when you're away.
notif.dailyReportDesc: Receive a summary of daily sales, orders, and revenue every morning.
notif.weeklyReportDesc: Get a detailed weekly breakdown of sales trends, top items, and staff performance.
notif.lowStockAlertEmailDesc: Get notified by email when inventory items fall below the minimum threshold.
notif.billingDesc: Payment confirmations, upcoming renewals, and invoice receipts.
notif.newFeaturesDesc: Learn about new POS features, improvements, and platform updates.
notif.pushDesc: Get real-time alerts in the app to stay on top of your cafe activity.
notif.newOrderDesc: Alert when a new order is placed through POS or online.
notif.orderReadyDesc: Notify when a barista marks an order as ready to serve.
notif.lowStockAlertPushDesc: Instant alert when an ingredient or product is running low.
notif.staffLoginDesc: Get notified when a team member starts or ends their shift.
notif.dailySummaryDesc: A quick summary of total orders, revenue, and tips at closing time.
notif.orderAlertsDesc: Alerts for unusual activity or actions that need your attention at the register.
notif.largeOrderDesc: Notify when an order exceeds a certain amount (e.g. above 500 SAR).
notif.refundRequestDesc: Alert when a refund or return is processed at any terminal.
notif.voidItemDesc: Get notified when items are voided or removed from an active order.
notif.cashDrawerDesc: Alert when the cash drawer is opened without a sale transaction.
notif.expiringIngredientsDesc: Get notified when perishable items are approaching their expiry date.
notif.tipReportDesc: Summary of tips collected per staff member at the end of each day.
notif.peakHourDesc: Real-time updates during rush hours with live order count and wait times.
notif.deviceOfflineDesc: Critical alert when a receipt printer, terminal, or POS device goes offline.
notif.shiftHandoverDesc: Reminder before shift change to reconcile cash and review open orders.
notif.discountAbuseDesc: Alert when an unusual number of discounts are applied in a short period.
notif.insightsDesc: Optional insights about customer behavior and menu performance.
notif.loyaltyMilestoneDesc: Notify when a customer reaches a reward threshold in the loyalty program.
notif.slowItemDesc: Alert when a menu item hasn't been ordered for several days.
